name: Int.emod_eq_sub_self_emod
initialProofState:
a b : Int
⊢ Eq (HMod.hMod a b) (HMod.hMod (HSub.hSub a b) b)
decl:
theorem emod_eq_sub_self_emod {a b : Int} : a % b = (a - b) % b :=
  (emod_sub_cancel a b).symm

name: Int.emod_eq_add_self_emod
initialProofState:
a b : Int
⊢ Eq (HMod.hMod a b) (HMod.hMod (HAdd.hAdd a b) b)
decl:
theorem emod_eq_add_self_emod {a b : Int} : a % b = (a + b) % b :=
  add_emod_self.symm
